featuredProjects.title: Leveraging Semantics to Retrofit Security and Resiliency in Legacy CPS
featuredProjects.description: For deployed and legacy systems, how can we leverage knowledge about a cyber-physical system's semantics, e.g., the underlying physical equations, to enhance safety and security at all levels of the software stack?
featuredProjects.impact: Developing methods to enhance security in deployed industrial control systems without requiring hardware changes.

featuredProjects.title: Integrating Human Logic & Deep Learning for Trustworthy Autonomous Design
featuredProjects.description: What are the correct ways to interface symbolic knowledge and deep learning models in cyber-physical systems that allow humans to understand and intervene decision-making processes?
featuredProjects.impact: Creating interpretable AI systems for critical autonomous applications that maintain human oversight capabilities.

featuredProjects.title: Secure, Private, and Useful Ubiquitous Sensing
featuredProjects.description: With the explosion of IoT sensors, how can we expose useful programming abstractions to developers while ensuring secure and private cyber-physical information flow?
featuredProjects.impact: Developing secure programming frameworks for IoT applications with privacy guarantees.

featuredProjects.title: Physics-Informed Security Mechanisms for SCADA Systems
featuredProjects.description: Leveraging underlying physical equations and process models to detect anomalies and prevent attacks in supervisory control and data acquisition systems.
featuredProjects.impact: Protecting power grid and water treatment facilities from sophisticated attacks.
